reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate with Nuheat Conductor
reauth_confirm.description: Your authentication has expired. Please reauthenticate.

abort.already_in_progress: Configuration flow is already in progress. If you recently attempted setup and it failed during OAuth authentication, please restart Home Assistant and try again. Tip: Use the same device and browser for the entire OAuth flow.
abort.single_instance_allowed: Already configured. Only a single configuration possible.
abort.missing_configuration: The Nuheat Conductor integration is not configured. Please follow the documentation.
abort.no_url_available: No URL available. For information about this error, check the help section.
abort.oauth_timeout: OAuth authentication timed out or was interrupted. Please restart Home Assistant and try again using the same device and browser throughout the setup process.
